idea: ANANTA RESOURCE MANAGEMENT PRIVATE LIMITED works with the mission of empowering people with sustainable skills and supporting employers with vital resources. Here, we focus on making the best learning environment for our team and maximizing the best potential opportunities for the candidates. We started this journey of recruitment and staffing in 2017 and did plenty of successful recruitments till now. We have trained, hired, and place many interns successfully. In 2020, we became part of Tiecon Startup Fostering in Mumbai, and right now, covering all the major Tier 1 and Tier 2 cities across the country. Our branches are in Delhi, Mumbai, Gujarat, and Coimbatore. Along with this, we have served many clients and provided consultancy, marketing, and branding solutions on various business-related concerns as business solution providers. We provide all business support services such as accounting solutions, automation, process development, and many more. We provide a bouquet of services for employers, help them in the recruitment process and temporary staffing, and recruit and train the coming generation workforce and provide vigorous screening and time-tested recruitment processes.
name: ANANTA RESOURCE MANAGEMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: At AMAZINDIA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED, you can buy mangoes online from the comfort of your home and save yourself from a hectic trip to the market. Off lately due the increasing demand for mangoes in the online segment, we have fully extended our services for the online consumers to make their mango shopping easy, satisfactory & convenient. We hope that with this effort, we'll make the whole experience of mangoes shopping as exciting as it was ever before. Our customers can be rest assured that these mangoes are from our own farms and they are of the absolute best quality, grown without the use of any harmful chemicals. With this online venture, we are positive that mango lovers will now be able to get mangoes of A grade quality & savor their absolute taste and health benefits. ,Basically, when it comes to selecting mangoes everyone has their own favourite types, but ratnagiri mangoes also know as "Hafoos", "Hapoos" mangoes are the best known mangoes amongst all owing to its distinct taste, texture, colour and aroma. These export quality mangoes are also not easily available in the local markets hence, we have taken this initiative to bring ‚ÄòOriginal Ratnagiri Alphonso Mangoes‚Äô directly from our farms to your doorsteps
name: AMAZINDIA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1. To carry on the business of providing all solutions related to Hair problems, Hair growth, Hair transplant, Cosmetology solutions and such other related solutions and services in India and abroad.


2. To carry on business in India and abroad as importers, exporters, traders, buyers, sellers, retailers, wholesalers, suppliers, indenters, packers, movers, preservers, stockiest, agents, sub-agents, merchants, distributors, consignors, jobbers, brokers, concessionaires or otherwise deal in all types of nutritional products, pharmaceutical products, food supplements, nutritional supplements, mineral supplements, ayurvedic products, drugs, enzymes and all classes of chemicals used for manufacture of the aforesaid and all other kinds of chemicals and their by-products intermediates, derivatives, formulations and compounds and selling the said products online in India and abroad via an e-commerce platform or over the call (Tele-medicine) and providing Home services relating to the main object clause of the company. Also, to carry on the business of import and export of technological know-how related to the main object clause of the company.
name: JATA HAIR SCIENCES PRIVATE LIMITED
